bioghist.p: Melvin A. Benarde is the author of ten books, including Global Warning--Global Warming and Our Precarious Habitat. He is the former director of Temple University's Environmental Resource Center and a professor in their Graduate Program in Industrial Hygiene, professor and acting chairman in the Department of Community Medicine at Hahnemann Medical School, and Associate Director of the Environmental Studies Institute at Drexel University.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of typescript drafts of books written and edited by Melvin Benarde. The typescripts are annotated, some heavily and some with copy edits and instructions to typesetters. Titles include The Chemicals We Eat, The Race Against Famine, Our Precarious Habitat, and Disinfection.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
